article_title: Doctors Losing Out To Facilities As 'Usual Source For Care'

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Despite efforts by health insurers, employers and the Affordable Care Act to encourage patients to have a relationship with a primary care physician, one in five Americans has “no usual source of healthcare” and increasingly choose a “facility” over a doctor, according to a new study. Americans’ personal relationship with a [...]
